# Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012709
**Solicitation Number:** ISED204979

**The Government of Canada** invites proposals for the provision of infrastructure hosting services to support the auction of 3,800 MHz spectrum licenses. This tender closes on **December 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST)**.

### About the Project
Spectrum management in Canada is carried out by the Department of Industry under the Department of Industry Act, the Radiocommunication Act, and the Radiocommunication Regulations. The Spectrum Management Program operates under the guidance of the Spectrum Policy Framework for Canada.

To support the 3,800 MHz spectrum auction, **Power Auctions LLC** has been contracted to provide consulting services on auction design and an auction software solution. As a result, the **Government of Canada** is seeking a Contractor to provide month-to-month infrastructure hosting services in Canada.

### Tender Requirements
The Contractor will be responsible for providing:

* Primary and warm backup servers in their data centre(s) located in Canada
* Designated Organization Screening (DOS) for their data centre(s) issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* Month-to-month infrastructure hosting services for the PA Internet-based auction software

### Important Dates
* **Publication Date:** November 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Amendment Date:** December 12, 2022

### Supporting Documents
The tender package can be downloaded from the [Canadabuys Canada website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/07/f0e35930b32656e0b0a1dce0421be684/ised204979_-_npp.pdf).

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Email: [davis.opie@canada.ca](mailto:davis.opie@canada.ca)
* Phone: 613-324-9165
